data.title: Comedian's Net Worth in 2024, Movies, Wife, Kids, Stand Up Specials, and Bio
data.meta_description: Eddie Griffin is a popular black American comedian and actor. He started doing comedy in 1990 when he first stepped on the stage in a Kansan comedy club,
data.text:
Eddie Griffin is a popular black American comedian and actor. He started doing comedy in 1990 when he first stepped on the stage in a Kansan comedy club, Sanford and Sons, and performed off-the-cuff for 45 minutes straight! It was then that Eddie decided he was going to pursue his dreams and become a stand-up comedian. He has been consistently growing his fan base ever since.

What is Eddie Griffin’s net worth?

Eddie Griffin’s net worth is around $8 million in 2022, according to public sources. He made his fortune doing comedy and acting in movies and tv series.

Brain Donors (1992)

Eddie Griffin’s Stand Up Specials

How old is Eddie Griffin?

Eddie Griffin was born in 1968 and he is 54 years old now.

Eddie Griffin’s Wife

Eddie Griffin’s current wife is Ko Griffin (Ko Lee).

Eddie Griffin was divorced three times. His previous spouses were:

Carla Griffin ​ ​(married in 1984; divorced in 1997)​

Rochelle Griffin ​ ​(m. 2002; div. 2009)​

Nia Rivers ​ ​(m. 2011; div. 2012)

Eddie Griffin’s Kids?

Eddie Griffin has 11 children: Elexa Griffin, Eddie Griffin Jr., Meko Lee Griffin, and others.

Does Eddie Griffin have an education?

Eddie Griffin graduated Kansas State University.

Where does Eddie Griffin live?

Currently Eddie Griffin lives in Las Vegas.
